is the error term. In this study, the lagged effect of BI on dengue cases was also considered. We employed a 4 week lag to take into account the mosquito life cycle from larvae to adult flying mosquitoes (2 weeks), and the incubation periods of dengue viruses after mosquito feeding on an DENV-infected person (2 weeks) [ 53, 54]. The estimated results are displayed in Table 7.
